_meta_header.role: Defines the physical boundaries of the machine to prevent crashes.

cpu_governance._desc: Rules for processor usage to ensure the heartbeat never stops.

thread_allocation._comment: Prevent Python form hogging all cores via GIL.

infinite_loop_guard._forensic_rationale: If a process uses 100% CPU for >60s, it is likely bugged.

memory_management._desc: RAM allocation strategy to avoid OOM (Out Of Memory) Killer.

leak_detection._forensic_rationale: Slow memory growth indicates a leak in Pandas/Numpy.

swap_policy._reason: Swapping to disk is too slow for HFT (High Frequency Trading).

critical_reserve_mb._comment: Space reserved ONLY for the Black Box recorder.

ssd_wear_leveling._future_proofing: Avoid writing too many small files.

network_bandwidth._desc: Traffic shaping to prevent DDoS-ing ourselves.

bandwidth_reservation._comment: Always keep a lane open for the 'SELL' button.

gpu_acceleration._desc: Settings for Local LLM Inference (Future Module).
